name: sample-rust-api
description: Sample Rust API template for testing
author: Test Suite

files.content:
[package]
name = "{{project_name}}"
version = "0.1.0"
edition = "2021"

[dependencies]
actix-web = "4.4"
tokio = { version = "1", features = ["full"] }

# {{project_name}}

A simple Rust API server built with Actix-web.

## Running

```bash
cargo run
```
